comment: i-squared equals -1 (expressed as i-squared plus 1 is 0). Axiom 12 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-i2m1 . (Contributed by NM, 5-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
